required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Ledipasvir/Sofosbuvir in Adults With Chronic Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Infection Who Are on Dialysis for End Stage Renal Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2, Multicenter, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Ledipasvir/Sofosbuvir in Subjects With Genotype 1, 4, 5 and 6 Chronic HCV Infection Who Are on Dialysis for End Stage Renal Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objectives of this study are to evaluate the safety, efficacy and tolerability of treatment with ledipasvir/sofosbuvir (LDV/SOF) in adults with chronic HCV infection who are on dialysis for ESRD.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response (SVR) 12 Weeks After Discontinuation of Therapy (SVR12)
primary_outcome.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) < the lower limit of quantitation (LLOQ; ie, 15 IU/mL) at 12 weeks after stopping study treatment. The exact 95% confidence interval (CI) for the percentage within treatment group was based on the Clopper-Pearson method.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Permanently Discontinued Study Drug Due to an Adverse Event
primary_outcome.time_frame: First dose date up to Week 24

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With SVR at 4 Weeks After Discontinuation of Therapy (SVR4)
secondary_outcome.description: SVR4 was defined as HCV RNA < LLOQ (ie, 15 IU/mL) at 4 weeks after stopping study treatment. The exact 95% CI for the percentage within treatment group was based on the Clopper-Pearson method.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With SVR at 24 Weeks After Discontinuation of Therapy (SVR24)
secondary_outcome.description: SVR24 was defined as HCV RNA < LLOQ (ie, 15 IU/mL) at 24 weeks after stopping study treatment. The exact 95% CI for the percentage within treatment group was based on the Clopper-Pearson method.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With HCV RNA < LLOQ on Treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The total number of participants with HCV RNA < LLOQ was the sum of the number of participants with HCV RNA "< LLOQ detected" plus the number of participants with HCV RNA "< LLOQ target not detected (TND)". LLOQ was 15 IU/mL. The exact 95% CI for the percentage within treatment group was based on the Clopper-Pearson method.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HCV RNA
Percentage of Participants With Virologic Failure
secondary_outcome.description: Virologic failure was defined as: On-treatment virologic failure: Breakthrough (confirmed HCV RNA ≥ LLOQ after having previously had HCV RNA < LLOQ while on treatment), or Rebound (confirmed > 1 log10 IU/mL increase in HCV RNA from nadir while on treatment), or Non-response (HCV RNA persistently ≥ LLOQ through 8 weeks of treatment) Virologic relapse: Confirmed HCV RNA ≥ LLOQ during the posttreatment period having achieved HCV RNA < LLOQ at last on-treatment visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Developed Resistance to LDV and SOF

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: AUCtau is defined as the population PK derived area under the concentration versus time curve of the drug over the dosing interval.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: AUCtau is defined as the population PK derived area under the concentration versus time curve of the drug over the dosing interval.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: AUCtau of GS-331007 (Metabolite of SOF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: AUCtau is defined as the population PK derived area under the concentration versus time curve of the drug over the dosing interval.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the population PK derived maximum concentration of the drug.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the population PK derived maximum concentration of the drug.

secondary_outcome.measure: PK Parameter: Cmax of GS-331007 (Metabolite of SOF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the population PK derived maximum concentration of the drug.

arm_group.description: Treatment-naive participants with genotype 1 without cirrhosis will receive LDV/SOF for 8 weeks

Treatment-experienced participants with genotype 1 and treatment-naive or treatment-experienced participants with genotype 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5 and 6 without cirrhosis will receive LDV/SOF for 12 weeks
Participants with compensated cirrhosis will receive LDV/SOF for 24 weeks

intervention.description: 90/400 mg fixed- dose combination (FDC) tablet administered orally once daily

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Chronic HCV infected genotype 1, 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5, or 6 male and nonpregnant/ nonlactating females aged 18 years or older who are on dialysis for ESRD, including adults with HIV coinfection if they are suppressed on a stable, protocol-approved antiretroviral (ARV) regimens for ≥8 weeks prior to screening.
NOTE: Other protocol defined Inclusion/ Exclusion criteria may apply.

facility.name: The Liver Institute at Methodist Dallas Medical Center
Universitatsklinikum Hamburg-Eppendorf (UKE), Zentrum fur Innere Medizin - Studienambulanz Hepatol.
Ifi Studien und Projekt GmbH an der Asklepios Klinik St. Georg
IRCCS Ospedale Casa Sollievo Della Sofferrenza
Fondazione IRCCS Cà Granda Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico
Azienda Ospedaliera Città della Salute e della Scienza di Torino
Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital
Chang Gung Medical Foundation, Kaohsiung Chang Gung Memorial Hospital

reference.citation: Chuang W-L, Hu T-H, Buggisch P, et al. Ledipasvir/sofosbuvir for 8, 12, or 24 weeks is safe and effective in patients undergoing dialysis. J Hepatol 2019;70 (Suppl 1S):e225.

patient_data.ipd_description: Qualified external researchers may request IPD for this study after study completion. For more information, please visit our website at https://www.gilead.com/science-and-medicine/research/clinical-trials-transparency-and-data-sharing-policy.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: A secured external environment with username, password, and RSA code.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: Participants were enrolled at study sites in Taiwan, Italy, Germany, the United States, and Belgium. The first participant was screened on 27 June 2017. The last study visit occurred on 14 February 2019.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 8 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-naive genotype 1 participants without cirrhosis received ledipasvir/sofosbuvir (LDV/SOF) (90/400 mg) fixed-dose combination (FDC) tablet once daily orally with or without food for 8 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 12 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-experienced genotype 1 participants and treatment-naive or treatment-experienced genotype 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5, and 6 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 12 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 24 Weeks
group.description: Participants with compensated cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 24 weeks.

baseline.population: The Safety Analysis Set included all participants who received at least 1 dose of study drug. Participants were grouped within the Safety Analysis Set according to the treatment they actually received.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 8 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-naive genotype 1 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 8 weeks.

group.description: Treatment-experienced genotype 1 participants and treatment-naive or treatment-experienced genotype 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5, and 6 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 12 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 24 Weeks
group.description: Participants with compensated cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 24 weeks.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

measure.title: IL28b Status
measure.description: The CC, CT, and TT alleles are different forms of the IL28b gene

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response (SVR) 12 Weeks After Discontinuation of Therapy (SVR12)
outcome.description: SVR12 was defined as hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) < the lower limit of quantitation (LLOQ; ie, 15 IU/mL) at 12 weeks after stopping study treatment. The exact 95% confidence interval (CI) for the percentage within treatment group was based on the Clopper-Pearson method.
outcome.population: The Full Analysis Set (FAS) included participants who were enrolled into the study and received at least 1 dose of study drug. Participants were grouped within the Full Analysis Set by genotype and treatment group to which they were enrolled.

measure.title: Percentage of Participants With Virologic Failure
measure.description: Virologic failure was defined as: On-treatment virologic failure: Breakthrough (confirmed HCV RNA ≥ LLOQ after having previously had HCV RNA < LLOQ while on treatment), or Rebound (confirmed > 1 log10 IU/mL increase in HCV RNA from nadir while on treatment), or Non-response (HCV RNA persistently ≥ LLOQ through 8 weeks of treatment) Virologic relapse: Confirmed HCV RNA ≥ LLOQ during the posttreatment period having achieved HCV RNA < LLOQ at last on-treatment visit.
measure.population: Participants in the Full Analysis Set were analyzed.

outcome.title: Percentage of Participants Who Developed Resistance to LDV and SOF
outcome.population: The Resistance Analysis Population was defined as all participants in the Safety Analysis Set with a virologic outcome and at least 1 gene sequenced. As no participant had a relapse in this study, this outcome could not be analyzed.

outcome.title: Pharmacokinetics (PK) Parameter: AUCtau of LDV
outcome.description: AUCtau is defined as the population PK derived area under the concentration versus time curve of the drug over the dosing interval.
outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
outcome.population: The PK Analysis Set included all participants who took at least 1 dose of the study drug and had at least 1 nonmissing postdose concentration value for the corresponding analyte in plasma.

measure.population: The PK Analysis Set included all participants who took at least 1 dose of the study drug and had at least 1 nonmissing postdose concentration value for the corresponding analyte in plasma.

outcome.population: Participants in the PK Analysis Set with available data were analyzed.

outcome.title: PK Parameter: Cmax of GS-331007 (Metabolite of SOF)
outcome.description: Cmax is defined as the population PK derived maximum concentration of the drug.
outcome.time_frame: Sparse PK Samples at Weeks 6, 8, and 12 (all participants). Intensive PK samples at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, and 12 hours postdose once at Weeks 6, 8, or 12 (participants who enrolled in the optional PK substudy (N=2))
outcome.population: Participants in the PK Analysis Set were analyzed.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 8 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-naive genotype 1 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 8 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 12 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-experienced genotype 1 participants and treatment-naive or treatment-experienced genotype 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5, and 6 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 12 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 24 Weeks
group.description: Participants with compensated cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 24 weeks.

measure.title: PK Parameter: Cmax of GS-331007 (Metabolite of SOF)
measure.description: Cmax is defined as the population PK derived maximum concentration of the drug.
measure.population: Participants in the PK Analysis Set were analyzed.

reported_events.time_frame: Adverse Events: First dose date up to Week 24 plus 30 days; All-Cause Mortality: First dose date up to Posttreatment Week 24
reported_events.desc: The Safety Analysis Set included all participants who received at least 1 dose of study drug. Participants were grouped within the Safety Analysis Set according to the treatment they actually received.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 8 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-naive genotype 1 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 8 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 12 Weeks
group.description: Treatment-experienced genotype 1 participants and treatment-naive or treatment-experienced genotype 2 (Taiwan only), 4, 5, and 6 participants without cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 12 weeks.

group.title: LDV/SOF for 24 Weeks
group.description: Participants with compensated cirrhosis received LDV/SOF (90/400 mg) FDC tablet once daily orally with or without food for 24 weeks.

category.title: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps)

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: After conclusion of the study and without prior written approval from Gilead, investigators in this study may communicate, orally present, or publish in scientific journals or other media only after the following conditions have been met: The results of the study in their entirety have been publicly disclosed by or with the consent of Gilead in an abstract, manuscript, or presentation form; or The study has been completed at all study sites for at least 2 years
